member.name: ID2D1EffectContext1.CreateLookupTable3D
member.summary: Creates a 3D lookup table for mapping a 3-channel input to a 3-channel output. The table data must be provided in 4-channel format.
member.param: Precision of the input lookup table data.
Number of lookup table elements per dimension (X, Y, Z).
Buffer holding the lookup table data.
Size of the lookup table data buffer.

An array containing two values. The first value is the size in bytes from one row (X dimension) of LUT data to the next. The second value is the size in bytes from one LUT data plane (X and Y dimensions) to the next.
Receives the new lookup table instance.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext1
member.summary: Provides factory methods and other state management for effect and transform authors.
